p: Besides, in a number of cases, it was extremely complicated to identify possible intra- and intersubtypical recombinant events due to a high level of identity of HIV-1 subtype A and CRF63_02A1 sequences (e.g., in the region encoding virus integrase), since it is subtype A that is one of the ancestral viruses for the newly emerged recombinant virus CRF63_02A1 [ 22].
